com.canabang.genietext.transit.model.io
Class XmlAllStopsParser

java.lang.Object
  com.canabang.genietext.core.model.io.xml.XmlParser
      com.canabang.genietext.transit.model.io.XmlAllStopsParser

public class XmlAllStopsParser
extends XmlParser

Parses a "allstops.xml" file generated by the Ottawa Travel Planner - OC Data stop analysis tool written by Michael Hurts. Gets a list of stops and their corresponding buses that arrive at those locations.

Version:
1.00 2009-05-31 Initial submission.
Author:
rhaq

Method Detail

parse

public Map<Intersection,Set<Station>> parse(InputStream file)
                                     throws SAXException,
                                            IOException
Parses the specified file and retrieves the location data stored within.

Parameters:
file - The file to parse for the location data.
Returns:
The location data stored in the file.
Throws:
SAXException - If there are any problems parsing the XML file associated with the transit service.
IOException - If there is a problem accessing the resource file for the transit service.
